title: Nadhiye Nadhiye Song Lyrics Rhythm
stanzas: <div>Nadhiye Nadhiye Song Lyrics Rhythm

theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
thiranaa (2)

Nadhiye nadhiye
kadhal nadhiye
neeyum penthaane
adi neeyum penthaane

ondraa irandaa
kaaranum nooru
kettaal solvene
nee kaettaa solvene

theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
thiranaa (2)

nadanthaal aaru
ezhunthaal aruvi
nindraal kadal allo

samaindhaal kumari
mananthaal manaivi
pettraar thaaiyallo

siru nadhigale
nadhiyidum karaigale
karai thodum nuraigale
nuraigalil ival mugame(2)

[dhinam modhum
karai thorum
ada aarum isaipaadum
jill jill endra shruthiyile

gangi varum
yamunai varum
vaigai varum
porunai  varum
jal jal jal endra nadaiyile](2)

kadhali arumai pirivil
manaiviyin arumai maraivil
neerin arumai arivaai
kodaiyile

vetkam vandhaal uraiyum
viralgal thottaal urugum
neerum pennum ondru
vaadaiyile

thanneer kudathil
pirakkirom o ho
thanneer karaiyil
mudikkirom o ho (2)

theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
thiranaa (2)

vanna vanna penne
vatta vatta nadhiye
valaivugal azhagu
ungal valaivugal azhagu

oh mellisaigal padithal
maedu pallam maraithal
nadhigalin guname
adhu nangaiyin guname

siru nadhigale
nadhiyidum karaigale
karai thodum nuraigale
nuraigalil ival mugame(2)

dhinam modhum
karai thorum
ada aarum isaipaadum
...

gangi varum
yamunai varum
vaigai varum
porunai  varum
..

theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
thiranaa (2)

thaenkaniyil saaraagi
pookkalile thaenaagi
pasuvinile paalaagum neere

thaai arugae seiyaagi
thalaivanidam paaiyaagi
sei arugae thaai aagum penne

poonguyile poonguyile
pennum aarum
vadivam maara koodum

neer ninaithal
pen ninaithaal
karaigal yaavum
karaindhu poga koodum

Nadhiye nadhiye
kadhal nadhiye
neeyum penthaane
adi neeyum penthaane

ondraa irandaa
kaaranum nooru
kettaal solvene
nee kaettaa solvene

theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
theem thanana theem thananaa
thiranaa (2)

seo.title: Nadhiye Nadhiye Song Lyrics Rhythm
seo.description: Get the complete Nadhiye Nadhiye Song Lyrics Rhythm from Rhythm. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Unni Menon. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Rhythm, AR Rahman, Unni Menon, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
